sentences: Ernie Mendillo (born October 23, 1959) is an American musician who co-founded the New York band The Brandos with Dave Kincaid in 1985.
Besides playing with The Brandos, Mendillo was also a member of the Sarajevo rock band Bombaj Štampa.
He is currently a member of HELP!
A Beatles Tribute, performing concerts throughout Europe.
As a musician he has worked with Dion DiMucci, Scott Kempner, Dennis Diken, Simon Kirke, Branko Đurić and Pero Lovšin.
